Package com.notkamui.javaisyou.engine.manager

Class RuleManager

java.lang.Object
com.notkamui.javaisyou.engine.manager.RuleManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChecker
public final class RuleManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PropertyChecker
This class manages the rules of a level by updating them and applying them. A RuleManager knows its active rules, default rules, as well as the model of the level.
